Name: Use live expressions
Description: Can I watch JavaScript values in real time with Live Expressions?

Notes: 1. In the **Console** panel, click the **Create live expression** icon. Input the expression in the text box and press `Enter`.
2. The value below the pinned expression is its result. The result updates every 250ms.
3. For a multi-line expression, start a new line using `Shift+Enter`.
4. To use multiple live expressions, click the same icon again to add a new expression. To remove the expression, click the `X` button next to it.
References: 1. "Watch JavaScript values in real time with Live Expressions", [Chrome DevTools Docs](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/devtools/console/live-expressions/).
